statements: SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM game_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE price < 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM game_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase';
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, item_name, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN inventory ON transactions.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT transaction_id, item_name, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN inventory ON transactions.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT name, price FROM items WHERE price > 100
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM inventory GROUP BY player_id
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT player_id, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_spent FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id GROUP BY player_id
SELECT name, price FROM items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM items;
SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY item_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id WHERE purchases.item_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT game_name, inventory_count FROM game_inventory WHERE inventory_count > 0;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_price FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Accessory';
SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY game_id DESC, game_name ASC
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_price FROM items WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY item_price DESC

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, users.username, items.item_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM transactions INNER JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id INNER JOIN items ON transactions.item_id = items.item_id INNER JOIN purchases ON transactions.transaction_id = purchases.purchase_id
SELECT game_name, inventory_count FROM game_inventory WHERE inventory_count < 10
SELECT username, email FROM users
